WarlockLevel3Spells.Name: Counterspell
WarlockLevel3Spells.Description: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell.

WarlockLevel3Spells.Name: Dispel Magic
WarlockLevel3Spells.Description: Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any spell of 3rd level or lower on the target ends.

WarlockLevel3Spells.Name: Fear
WarlockLevel3Spells.Description: You project a phantasmal image of a creature's worst fears.

WarlockLevel3Spells.Name: Fly
WarlockLevel3Spells.Description: You touch a willing creature. The target gains a flying speed of 60 feet for the duration.

WarlockLevel3Spells.Name: Gaseous Form
WarlockLevel3Spells.Description: You transform a willing creature you touch, along with everything it's wearing and carrying, into a misty cloud.

WarlockLevel3Spells.Name: Hypnotic Pattern
WarlockLevel3Spells.Description: You create a twisting pattern of colors that weaves through the air inside a 30-foot cube within range.

WarlockLevel3Spells.Name: Magic Circle
WarlockLevel3Spells.Description: You create a 10-foot-radius, 20-foot-tall cylinder of magical energy centered on a point on the ground that you can see within range.

WarlockLevel3Spells.Name: Major Image
WarlockLevel3Spells.Description: You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 20-foot cube.

WarlockLevel3Spells.Name: Remove Curse
WarlockLevel3Spells.Description: At your touch, all curses affecting one creature or object end.

WarlockLevel3Spells.Name: Tongues
WarlockLevel3Spells.Description: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken language it hears.

WarlockLevel3Spells.Name: Vampiric Touch
WarlockLevel3Spells.Description: The touch of your shadow-wreathed hand can siphon life force from others to heal your wounds.
